# <a name="insert-pictures-in-an-email-message-or-calendar-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="79be5-102">在电子邮件或日历事件中插入图片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-102">Insert pictures in an email message or calendar event</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="79be5-103">您可以在您的 Outlook.com 电子邮件、日历事件或电子邮件签名中插入您的计算机或 OneDrive 中的照片、gif 或剪贴画作为内嵌图像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-103">You can insert photos, gifs, or clipart from your computer or OneDrive as inline images in your Outlook.com email messages, calendar events, or email signature.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="79be5-104">开始撰写邮件或创建日历事件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-104">Begin composing a message or creating a calendar event.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="79be5-105">选择 "**插入图片" 嵌入式**图标</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-105">Select the **Insert pictures inline** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="79be5-106">在撰写窗口的底部（**附加**图标的旁边）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-106">at the bottom of the compose window (next to the **Attach** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="79be5-107">).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-107">).</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="79be5-108">选择要插入的图片，然后选择 "**打开**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-108">Choose the picture you want to insert and select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="79be5-109">拖动角以调整图像大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-109">Drag the corners to resize the image.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="79be5-110">右键单击图像以查看格式选项。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-110">Right-click the image to see formatting options.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="79be5-111">阅读有关如何[在 Outlook.com 中附加文件的](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79be5-111">Read more about how to [attach files in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8d7c1ea7-4e5f-44ce-bb6e-c5fcc92ba9ab?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
